headline: KT&G becomes First Player in the Industry to Secure 'AAA' MSCI ESG Rating
summary: KT&G(KRX: 033780) obtained a "AAA" ESG rating from the global investment decision support company MSCI(Morgan Stanley Capital International), the highest rating in history for any industry player.

raw.headline: KT&G becomes First Player in the Industry to Secure 'AAA' MSCI ESG Rating
